Package project.testmaster.backend.service

package project.testmaster.backend.service
This package contains service classes responsible for implementing the business logic of the application. Service classes in this package interact with repositories to handle data persistence and other operations, and they integrate utilities such as password encoding for secure functionality.

Main classes include:

  • AccountService - Manages account-related operations such as account creation, retrieval, and password verification.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    project.testmaster.backend
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountDetailsService
    Service implementation of UserDetailsService for handling operations related to user account authentication details.
    AccountService
    Service class responsible for business logic related to Account operations.
    AdminService
    Service class responsible for providing administrative operations within the application.
    ExamService
    Service class that provides functionalities to manage exams and exam sessions.
    OtpService
    Service class for handling operations related to OTP (One-Time Password) generation.
    QuestionService
    Service class for managing operations related to Question entities.
    StudentService
    Service class responsible for managing student-related operations.
    TeacherService
    Service class for managing Teacher-related functionality.
    UserService
    Service class responsible for user management, including creation, retrieval, update, deletion of users, and user authentication through login functionality.
